entry.summary:
Author: BxtchInADxtch

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,171Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 40

Summary: He was an advisor and he was a prince. He advised the prince that he wasn't the one for him. But it seems the prince loves to never listen.Among the intergalactic council of the collision, and his home, the planet of Seraphic, Chan was known for the kind of man he was. For his strategic mind and his wisdom.He was the kings advisor, having served the kings of each Seraphian generation.Prince Seungmin of Seraphic was one of the reasons chan would never find himself married. Why? Because this young prince had claimed chan the moment they met. Seungmin was the only son of the king. The king practically let the young boy get away with everything.He was a complete and utter spoilt brat. He was reckless and a cunning prince.Chan Knows. Prince Seungmin will always get what he wants.
